replaceConfiguration.name: "var = volatile = E" should be "volatile = var = E"

constraint.name: field
constraint.script:
"import com.intellij.psi.PsiField import com.intellij.psi.PsiModifier import com.intellij.psi.PsiReferenceExpression import com.intellij.psi.PsiVariable
field instanceof PsiReferenceExpression && ((PsiReferenceExpression)field).resolve() instanceof PsiField && ((PsiField)((PsiReferenceExpression)field).resolve()).hasModifierProperty(PsiModifier.VOLATILE) && var instanceof PsiReferenceExpression && ((PsiReferenceExpression)var).resolve() instanceof PsiVariable && !((PsiVariable)((PsiReferenceExpression)var).resolve()).hasModifierProperty(PsiModifier.VOLATILE)"

searchConfiguration.name: @HardwareAgentRequired should be applied only for performance tests
@HardwareAgentRequired should be applied only for performance tests
Anonymous Disposable passed to method
searchConfiguration.description: Do not pass Disposer.newDisposable() or similar to method expecting Disposable, because it can cause memory leak via Disposer tree. Instead, pass Disposable which you can guarantee to be disposed at the time needed.
searchConfiguration.problemDescriptor: Anonymous Disposable passed to method: possible memory leak

searchConfiguration.name: Anonymous Disposable passed to method
Anonymous threads are discouraged; please supply name
Anonymous threads are discouraged; please supply name

replaceConfiguration.name: can use ArrayUtil
replaceConfiguration.description: emptyCollection.toArray() creates new array whereas ArrayUtil.toArray() methods don't similarly, ArrayUtil.EMPTY_*_ARRAY don't allocate

constraint.name: __context__
constraint.script:
"import com.intellij.psi.* import com.intellij.psi.search.GlobalSearchScope import com.intellij.psi.util.PsiUtil
def stringUtil = JavaPsiFacade.getInstance(e.getProject()).findClass("com.intellij.openapi.util.text.StringUtil", GlobalSearchScope.allScope(e.getProject())); def strVirtualFile = PsiUtil.getVirtualFile(stringUtil);
e instanceof PsiLiteralExpression && e.getParent().getParent().getParent() instanceof PsiIfStatement && ((PsiIfStatement)e.getParent().getParent().getParent()).getElseBranch() == null && strVirtualFile != null && e.getResolveScope().contains(strVirtualFile)
"

__context__
__context__

replaceConfiguration.name: charset expression can be simplified
replaceConfiguration.description: e.g. charset used instead of the name, etc

searchConfiguration.name: Comparing Swift Types without context
searchConfiguration.description: Whether two types are equal depends on the context

searchConfiguration.name: Don't use Channel in function signatures, consider using Send/ReceiveChannel
Don't use Channel in function signatures, consider using Send/ReceiveChannel

searchConfiguration.description: a type can be a type alias or a single-item tuple of a desired type. And you most likely want to support them as well

replaceConfiguration.name: invalid use of ArrayUtil.contains(): always returns false
invalid use of ArrayUtil.contains(): always returns false
Lambda can be replaced with Pair.comparingByFirst()
Lambda can be replaced with Pair.comparingByFirst()
Lambda can be replaced with Pair.comparingBySecond()
Lambda can be replaced with Pair.comparingBySecond()

searchConfiguration.name: Logger.getInstance(unknown class)

constraint.name: __context__
__context__
__context__

searchConfiguration.name: Logger should be a top-level declaration
searchConfiguration.description: Creating a logger for each instance of a class isn't optimized. The idiomatic way to create a logger is using a top-level declaration.
searchConfiguration.problemDescriptor: Logger should be a top-level declaration.

replaceConfiguration.name: Manual TextRange.substring() implementation
replaceConfiguration.description: Reports code pattern like str.substring(range.getStartOffset(), range.getEndOffset()). This code could be replaced with range.substring(str)

searchConfiguration.name: Method reference can slow down startup
searchConfiguration.description: Method references in class initializers cause qualifier class to be loaded as well, even if that reference would never be invoked

constraint.name: __context__

replaceConfiguration.name: new String(byte[]) is default locale dependent; use new String(byte[], Charset) instead
new String(byte[]) is default locale dependent; use new String(byte[], Charset) instead

searchConfiguration.name: non-static JamAnnotationMeta
non-static JamAnnotationMeta
nullability for array elements specified, probably nullability for the array itself was intended
nullability for array elements specified, probably nullability for the array itself was intended

replaceConfiguration.name: Over-dependence on fastutil Collections
replaceConfiguration.description: Factory method CollectionFactory.createXXX() should be used to reduce dependence on concrete collection implementation from third-party library
replaceConfiguration.problemDescriptor: Should use factory method instead of direct ctr call

searchConfiguration.name: Potential memory leak: don't hold PsiElement inside quick fix, use SmartPsiElementPointer or instead of; also see LocalQuickFixOnPsiElement
Potential memory leak: don't hold PsiElement inside quick fix, use SmartPsiElementPointer or instead of; also see LocalQuickFixOnPsiElement

replaceConfiguration.name: Potential non-desired escape from lambda expression
Potential non-desired escape from lambda expression

searchConfiguration.name: reachabilityFence() shouldn't be called with complex expression
searchConfiguration.description: Only local variable references and "this" should be passed to reachabilityFence() method. Passing complex expression which calculate/create some object doesn't make sense because avoiding garbage-collecting this object is trivial when the object is just created.
searchConfiguration.problemDescriptor: Only locals/'this' should be passed to reachabilityFence()

constraint.name: __context__
constraint.script: com.intellij.psi.PsiTryStatement ts = com.intellij.psi.util.PsiTreeUtil.getParentOfType(__context__, com.intellij.psi.PsiTryStatement.class, false); return ts != null && ts.getCatchSections().length == 0

searchConfiguration.name: Suspicious usage of PsiUtilBase#findEditor inside quick fix, probably better idea to use LocalQuickFixAndIntentionActionOnPsiElement

constraint.name: MethodCall
constraint.script:
"import com.intellij.psi.PsiClass import com.intellij.psi.util.InheritanceUtil import com.intellij.psi.util.PsiTreeUtil
PsiClass aClass = PsiTreeUtil.getParentOfType(__context__, PsiClass.class) aClass != null && InheritanceUtil.isInheritor(aClass, "com.intellij.codeInspection.LocalQuickFix")"

searchConfiguration.name: Suspicious usage of PsiUtilBase#findEditor inside quick fix, probably better idea to use LocalQuickFixAndIntentionActionOnPsiElement

constraint.name: MethodCall
constraint.script:
"import com.intellij.psi.PsiClass import com.intellij.psi.util.InheritanceUtil import com.intellij.psi.util.PsiTreeUtil
PsiClass aClass = PsiTreeUtil.getParentOfType(__context__, PsiClass.class) aClass != null && InheritanceUtil.isInheritor(aClass, "com.intellij.codeInspection.LocalQuickFix")"
